attributes.review: All I wanted were some funny pictures of Trump so I downloaded this app and that’s not what I got. The app description is very misleading, and the app itself just doesn’t work. It’s super buggy and it has no funny looking pictures of Trump. Very disappointing, a horrible app!

attributes.review: do NOT download this app!! i opened it on my ipad and within five my ipad crashed and won’t turn back on. not to mention the few minutes i spent on this app were very confusing. it’s not user friendly whatsoever and hard to navigate. i truly wanted to see what our president’s plans were and how he’d deal with this current social climate, but sadly that wasn’t possible. i always try to stay open minded and give apps the best chance but this app was completely a waste of time.

attributes.review: First I’d like to point out, this is the worst app I’ve ever used.  When I go into it, all it does is glitch me out.  Not to mention, this took me at least 22 days to download.  When ever I go on it, all it does is get staticky and makes a weird buzzing noise.  Please delete.  And I already thought 2020 was bad enough. 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤢🤮🤢🤢🤮🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤮🤮
attributes.title: Worst app ever in history

attributes.review: At first it was great but after a few days I started hearing racist, sexist, homophobic things in my ears at 3 in the morning. I started to lose hair and gain weight and every time I opened the app my skin got one shade more orange. I also had the urge to tell my daughter she is very hot even though I don’t have a daughter. I also told everyone to go drink Lysol I had to delete the app.
attributes.title: Please delete immediately
